name: **Brown Island**
description: Brown Island V716-631 Sheet 84 A small islet on the NE side of Rossdohan, Brown is distinguished for its sandy beach on its N side that is available for bathing above mid-tide, where land. Wooded entirely, it has been planted for effect with fuschia, whitebeam, palm and beech. A narrow channel on the E side separates it from a large area of drying rocks where seals are a-plenty.
